item.title: Welcome to antiz.fr!
item.description: As stated in the home page, this website serves as a central place to get general/contact info about me. It also contains a list to all my social media. If you want to contact me, reach me at robincandau@protonmail.com, @Antiz96 on Twitter or Antiz#4953 on Discord. I’ll use this blog section to publish some blog posts when I feel like it.
